name: The Everyday Magic of Cleaning: Magi Condo
name_original: The Everyday Magic of Cleaning: Magi Condo
description:
You are a wizard. Your wizard tower is very messy. You have to clean it up! IT'S CLEANING DAY!!!!

Experience the everyday magic of THIS MAGI'S CONDO!!

  • Controls
  • Move: Left stick/WASD
  • Sprint: Left Trigger/LeftShift
  • Pick up: Tap B / Circle / E
  • Drop: Hold B / Circle / E
  • Throw (Hold to charge): X / Square / Q

Code by @Rolopogo

Art by @Hideous_

Sound by @heyjellybear
